entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
